Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 28th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2009...
Injured on 7/6/2009 with a Broken Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Washington on 5/23/2010 (Going to PHI: CF C. Crisp. Going to WSH: 2B J. Keppinger, SS M. Lipka, CF B. Castro, P R. Soriano, LF J. Martinez)...
Injured on 4/16/2011 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Washington to Minnesota on 2/23/2013 (Going to MIN: P J. Hellickson, P A. Alcazar, LF J. Martinez, LF D. Muñoz, C D. Norris. Going to WSH: P S. Marshall, SS R. Rohlinger)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/19/2013, off Trevor Cahill (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Detroit on 5/20/2015...
Injured on 7/20/2015 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 6/5/2020...
Injured on 8/28/2020 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/16/2021 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/27/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 9/29/2022...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 5/25/2024...
